document_data.name: ''When Mages Go to War''
document_data.author: [[Angarn Dunharp]]
document_data.Contents: The song depicted event preceding a mighty [[spell]]-battle and cautioned common folk to hide behind barred doors when [[mage]]s were about to throw incantations.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''When Mages Go to War'' was recorded in the [[book]] simply called ''[[Sword Coast Songbook]]'', available for purchase in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].
